alert.note: Alert for Coastal New Hanover; Coastal Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued May 08 at 8:23PM EDT until May 09 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM EDT MONDAY THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Strong north to south longshore current and a moderate risk of rip currents are both expected. * WHERE...In South Carolina, Coastal Georgetown County. In North Carolina, Coastal Pender and Coastal New Hanover Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM EDT Monday through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Longshore currents can sweep swimmers and surfers into rip currents, piers, jetties, and other hazardous areas. It may sweep swimmers off their feet, making it difficult to return to shore.
info.instruction: Caution should be used when in or near the water. Check with lifeguards before entering the ocean for possible hazards you may be swept into.
